title: Project Veritas: Pfizer wants to mutate Covid to sell more vaccines
cleaned_text:
Home » Disasters, Health, Manipulation, North America » Project Veritas: Pfizer wants to mutate Covid to sell more vaccines

In a surreptitiously recorded video, a senior executive at Pfizer reveals that his company is exploring a method to “mutate” covid-19 in order to develop future vaccines.

One of the things we are exploring is simply mutating the virus ourselves to be able to create and develop vaccines in advance. So we have to do it,” says Jordon Trishton Walker, Pfizer’s head of mRNA vaccine development, in the video.

Jordon Trishton Walker, unaware that he is being recorded by a hidden camera by the journalism network Project Veritas, continues:

But if we are going to do it, there are risks, as you can imagine. No one wants a drug company mutating goddamn viruses.

The Pfizer boss admits that people would not be happy if this became public.

Don’t tell anyone about this. Promise you won’t tell anyone. The way [the experiment] would work is we infect monkeys with the virus. We gradually get them to keep infecting each other, and then we collect serial samples from them.

He adds that he has heard that Pfizer scientists are optimizing the process to mutate the virus, but that they are going slowly to be cautious and not cause panic. He also compares this project to what may have happened at the virus lab in Wuhan, China, from which the virus is believed to have originally leaked.

Jordon Trishton Walker also confirms that covid-19 has been instrumental in Pfizer’s recent fantastic tax-funded business success.

Covid will probably remain a cash cow for us for a long time to come, he says.

This is very good for the pharmaceutical industry, but bad for everyone else, he continues, laughing.
• Gender Clinics Helping Children Transition as Young as 8 Years Old, Project Veritas Reveals
• Australia has silently withdrawn its authorization for the AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine
